sql.name: accidentaccept.causal
sql.item: select l.c802800005 from {500} l where 1=1 {3} order by l.c1

sql.name: accidentaccept.depertment
sql.item: select g.c630000018 as 故障地市,'部门' as 部门 from {300} g where 1=1 {3} --order by g.c1

sql.name: accidentaccept.depertmentanother
sql.item: select g.c630000018 from {300} g where 1=1 {3} order by g.c1
